programme.title: Bling
programme.desc: Chris has a very tricky fix on his hands with an engagement ring which has previously lost its prized stone and undergone three repairs. On the buy counter, Helen makes Rita's day by finding her a beautiful ring to represent her birthstone, all for under her budget

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: With newsreader and presenter Dan Walker, and actresses Nancy Carroll and Anne Reid. Plus, Lesley Joseph stops by to frolic with geese

programme.title: Dare Master
programme.desc: Game show that sees teenage presenter Danny Murphy take on some of the craziest dares, from rock climbing to racing a hovercraft! Danny's at a strongman competition this time, but will he have what it takes to win all three challenges there?

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. When Bob's best friend Gummy goes missing, Lloyd and Abacus take on the task of finding him... which is only right as they were the ones who lost him. Lloyd suspects foul play, so he compiles a list of suspects and starts following the clues.

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. Lloyd always has Abacus over for dinner, so PB persuades Malcolm and Gena to let her invite Julie the Spider for dinner too. However, Lloyd's not convinced by Julie's promise not to eat them... and he decides to take precautions to ensure that his family don't become dinner!

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
programme.desc: Scott, Virgil and Kayo race to save a plummeting cargo zeppelin, which is equipped with a loading claw and fuel source that could prove deadly should the vessel crash. With the voices of Rasmus Hardiker, David Menkin and Angel Coulby

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam has asked for the power to control the weather so as to fully enjoy her time with her father watching the comet BARNEY 6 passing above earth. But with the half power, the weather changes rapidly to being linked to their emotions, and she risks creating a disaster when JC decides to show up...

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. When Mo learns that Stella is his partner in the best live video game of the year, it's the happiest day of his life, but his joy turns to despair when the game chosen happens to be Pickle Pandemonium. Mo is absolutely revolted by the tiny slimy condiments that give him cold sweats and sees his chance to shine and be a winner in front of Stella go up in smoke, so Mo decides to summon the power to control his emotions to avoid feeling disgust and play with a cool head.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Scooby Dooby Doo takes the gang to meet his good friend, Lucy Liu, at her art gallery in Queens. She has a large art studio above the gallery that she uses to paint and sculpt.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Laura Whitmore's Breakfast Show
programme.desc: With singer and TV presenter Louise Redknapp and actress and screenwriter Emer Kenny, as well as music from Miles Kane

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and the team are in Burton-upon-Trent, Staffordshire, with the McGinns, whose lives were turned upside down when dad Pete was seriously injured in the line of duty as a police officer. In the course of transforming their garden, Alan gives a masterclass in how to achieve a tropical feel using plants that can survive the British winter, and David Domoney tackles an awkward slope with a series of decking terraces and sitting areas linked by boardwalks. Frances Tophill and Katie Rushworth create raised beds full of grasses, and the addition of a hot tub provides the family with somewhere to relax

programme.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James looks forward to this year's Soccer Aid with comedian and actor Sanjeev Bhaskar and serves up recipes to enjoy during the big match with a little help from chefs Paul Ainsworth, Tommy Banks and John Hooker

programme.title: MotoGP Live
programme.desc: The Italian Grand Prix (Start-time 1.00pm). Coverage of the MotoGP race in the sixth round of the season, which comes from Mugello Circuit in Florence. Home favourites Francesco Bagnaia and Marco Bezzecchi are currently first and second respectively in the standings with just one point separating them, having won two races apiece so far this season

programme.title: The Masked Singer US
programme.desc: The four remaining Group A singers compete in the semi-finals and two are eliminated, while Will.i.am joins the panel as a guest judge

programme.title: Diamonds Are Forever (1971)
programme.desc: James Bond investigates a diamond-smuggling operation, and discovers that behind the scheme is his insidious arch-enemy Blofeld, who is planning to construct a devastating orbital doomsday weapon powered by the precious stones, which will force world powers to disarm and give him global domination. Spy adventure, starring Sean Connery, Jill St John, Charles Gray, Bernard Lee and Lois Maxwell

programme.title: Soccer Aid
programme.desc: England v Soccer Aid World XI (Kick-off 7.30pm). Dermot O'Leary and Alex Scott present live coverage of the pre-match build-up and all the action from this year's charity fixture, which takes place at Old Trafford. programme.title: World's Funniest Videos
programme.desc: Some are friendly and some are predatory - weve got both the tamed and the untamed on this episode. Check out a pet squirrel hitching a ride on a ceiling fan, a very confused dog stuck on a roof, a lion that wants to be king of a zoo, elephants that dont forget that theyre in charge of who gets to ride, a pony in the front seat of a car on the highway, a sheep thief and more! In our countdown, well also capture the top ten close encounters of the animal kind...

programme.title: Love Bites
programme.desc: Scarlett Moffatt hosts, as singleton Rashaun chooses to date one of Harley, Naomi and Keelie - not on their looks but their cooking skills. After picking his favourite menu, the cook behind it reveals themselves and joins him for a date

programme.title: Love Bites
programme.desc: Jack, Darren and Felix all attempt to make a seafood linguine from scratch in order to win a date with 22-year-old Ellie from London

programme.title: Love Bites
programme.desc: Scarlett Moffatt hosts a dating series in which suitors cook a three-course meal. Three single girls battle it out in the kitchen of love to win a date with hunky singleton James

programme.title: Dress to Impress
programme.desc: Tommy, Miguel and Jac buy an outfit for Londoner Remus, who then goes on a date with the person whose taste in clothes they liked best

programme.title: Dress to Impress
programme.desc: Three suitors buy an outfit for politics student Demi, who then goes on a date with the person whose taste in clothes they liked best

programme.title: Supermarket Sweep
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal hosts a revival of the supermarket-based game show in which three pairs of shoppers go wild in the aisles to win a 3,000 prize

programme.title: Family Fortunes
programme.desc: Gino D'Acampo hosts as the Shares of Worcester go up against the Alveranga family of Luton, trying to guess the most popular responses to surveys posed to 100 people for a chance to win a 30,000 jackpot prize

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a special charity edition game show, with former footballer David James, singer-songwriter and TV presenter Chelcee Grimes and radio host Marvin Humes attempting to guess the well-known phrases from the animated clues as they try to win the 50,000 jackpot for Unicef

programme.title: Get Smart (2008)
programme.desc: Clumsy Maxwell Smart's dream to leave his desk job at a secret intelligence agency and become a fully-fledged spy comes true when the identities of all the agents are exposed. Maxwell's boss has no choice but to send him into action to battle a sinister terrorist organisation. Comedy, based on the 1960s TV series, with Steve Carell, Anne Hathaway, Dwayne Johnson, Alan Arkin, Terence Stamp and James Caan

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: A blizzard forces the sleuthing spinster to spend a night in isolated Sittaford House, situated on a Devon moor. Mystery drama with an all-star cast, including Geraldine McEwan, Robert Hardy, Matthew Kelly, Patricia Hodge and Mel Smith

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Feature-length drama. While holidaying at the plush Bertram's Hotel in London, Miss Marple is presented with a fresh challenge to her deductive powers when the reading of a will leads to a double murder. Geraldine McEwan stars as the elderly spinster with a nose for a mystery, with guest appearances by Peter Davison, Mica Paris and Francesca Annis

programme.title: Foyle's War
programme.desc: It is July 1945 and, as Britain settles into peacetime, Foyle looks forward to retirement, but finds his life in turmoil once more when Samantha's employer Sir Leonard Spencer-Jones is found dead. Suspicion falls on Niko, a Russian PoW, who flees the Sussex coast and heads for a sanctuary in London - closely followed by Foyle, who has been sent to track him down by the War Office. But the investigation soon brings to light a conspiracy and an international cover-up which, if exposed, could bring down the British government. Max Brown joins the cast, with Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks, Anthony Howell, Eleanor Bron and Christopher Good

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective is brought in to investigate when a former Met police officer is stabbed to death outside a nightclub in Newcastle. The team initially suspects a crime of passion after it emerges the victim had recently rekindled his affair with his childhood sweetheart, whose husband has a history of violence. However, Vera uncovers evidence pointing to a more complex case involving inside information and the hostile takeover of a brewery. What did the deceased find out that cost him his life? Guest starring Jill Halfpenny, Christine Bottomley, Ralph Ineson and Liam Cunningham

programme.title: Foyle's War
programme.desc: Racial tensions erupt in Hastings when a black GI is suspected of murdering a local woman. The victim, an ex-lover of the suspect and the mother of his baby, was staying at a guest house where Samantha is assistant manager, and had been disowned by her family because of her mixed-race child. As Foyle investigates, he is not convinced the soldier could be capable of such a crime, and soon comes up against the might of the US Army as he tries to crack the case. Starring Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks, Obi Abili and Charlotte Riley

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: King Edward VII visits Eaton Place for a lavish dinner party, but the servants' duties are interrupted by the untimely appearance of Sarah, who is unfortunately expecting a new arrival of her own. Gordon Jackson and Jean Marsh star

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Dorothy becomes concerned her grand-daughter Taisie is being influenced by Rachel, while Janet is mortified when Gill berates her for inappropriate behaviour toward young sergeant Rob. The detective duo are sent to investigate the death of a man in a nursing home after his daughter complains about the level of care he had been receiving. Will they find any evidence of foul play? Detective drama, starring Lesley Sharp, Suranne Jones and Danny Miller

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Geraldine McEwan makes her last appearance as the spinster sleuth before handing over the knitting needles to Julia McKenzie. Following the death of old acquaintance Mr Rafiel, Miss Marple receives instructions drawn up prior to his demise asking her to embark on a coach tour to investigate an unspecified possible crime. It soon transpires that many of her companions are also travelling at his invitation and they are all in some way connected to a girl who went missing from a nun's sanctuary during World War Two, supposedly to be with her German lover, Rafiel's son Michael. Murder mystery, with a star-studded supporting cast including Richard E Grant, Johnny Briggs, Amanda Burton, Anne Reid, Ronni Ancona, George Cole, Will Mellor and Laura Michelle Kelly

As the locals go to the polls in a closely fought by-election and a beauty contest builds to its conclusion, Endeavour must navigate the choppy waters of both worlds as his investigation shakes the highest pillars of Oxford society. Meanwhile, Janet also has problems to deal with at home, as Elise moves in with her dad and his new girlfriend. But at least it inspires the detective to look at her own love life, as she confides in Rachel that she's started using dating sites. Crime drama, starring Suranne Jones, Lesley Sharp and Danny Miller

The crimebusters are united in the search for the killer of Rich Hutchings, who is found murdered in the flat he shares with his husband Adam. programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.desc: Part two of two. The twins abscond from Brockhurst College, but Pop manages to bring them back safe and sound - then lends his services to ensure the boarding school does not have to close. Meanwhile, Primrose makes an unusual request concerning affairs of the heart and Charley launches a bid to buy a local brewery. David Jason stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An investigation into a cattle auctioneer puts Mike's career in danger when he finds himself under suspicion of taking bribes. The case also puts his relationship with his wife in jeopardy, culminating in a final, shocking revelation from Jackie. Meanwhile, Vernon attempts to bottle the secret of eternal youth

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mike faces a stressful time as he struggles to cope with his wife's departure, and Tricia offers him a shoulder to cry on, but is beset by problems of her own after prescribing birth control to a 16-year-old. Meanwhile, Sergeant Craddock finds his efforts to prepare for an important visit hampered by a series of attacks on the station, and Vernon makes a startling discovery in his bathtub. Jason Durr and Clare Calbraith star

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Tensions flare at the hearing, where Charity's plea of not guilty makes Zoe's blood boil, leading to a confrontation with shocking implications. Marlon feels the pressure and Gloria is unnerved by a rival

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Gloria dredges up all the dirt she can find on Steph, before spreading it around the village, only for the plan to backfire. Charity begs Zoe to confess what she knows, but her pleas fall on deaf ears

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ashley is nervous as he visits Maxine in the chapel of rest - how will he react to seeing his dead wife laid out ready for burial? Meanwhile, Richard is beginning to crack, while Ken tries to persuade Ade's father to pay him a visit

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: It's an emotional day for Maxine's friends and family as they gather to pay their last respects to her - although for Audrey and Norris, the sad occasion provides a chance for them to get their heads together and try to work out who the killer could be

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The sleuth finds himself in interesting company as English socialites and American millionaires rub shoulders on board a train bound for the French Riviera. Passengers include oil magnate Rufus Van Aldin (Elliott Gould) and his daughter Ruth (Jaime Murray) - to whom he has given a magnificent ruby known as the Heart of Fire. With members of the aristocracy crammed into a confined space with their husbands, lovers and a renowned gemstone, murder cannot be far away. With Lindsay Duncan, Roger Lloyd Pack and James D'Arcy

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Part two of two. Carl Lomax's case comes to court, and a local reporter soon rakes up the dirt over Tricia's controversial decision to supply his girlfriend with birth-control drugs. Before long, he escapes from custody and goes on the run with Deborah. Meanwhile, Vernon invests in a new money-making scheme

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Aidensfield residents are shocked when an MI5 agent turns up in the village showing more than just a passing interest in the activities of Vernon Scripps and his mysterious associate, a man who disembarked from a Russian trawler docked in Whitby harbour. It seems there is an even darker side to the roguish wheeler-dealer than they suspected

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a woman is drowned in a bath and made to look like a bride, with a chilling lipstick message on the bathroom mirror, it triggers a spate of ghoulish wedding-themed murders in Great Worthy. The case takes Barnaby and Jones to a donkey sanctuary, a heritage steam railway and a pub run by an ex-policeman and former brothel madam as they try to identify the killer. Guest starring Pam Ferris (Rosemary & Thyme) and Kacey Ainsworth (formerly EastEnders' Little Mo)

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: As Syndicate 9 investigates the discovery of a woman's body in a Manchester hotel room, Gill introduces Rachel to high-flying DS Will Pemberton, unaware they are already well acquainted - they've been having a passionate, secret relationship for months. But while the volatile copper can be discreet when it comes to romance, will she be able to hide her feelings when Gill lets slip that she wasn't the first choice for the sergeant's job? Meanwhile, Janet is keen to give her own love life a boost, especially after seeing how happy Ade is with his new partner Eleanor. However, a speed-dating event might not be the best option, as Janet finds herself treating each brief encounter like a police interrogation. Crime drama, starring Suranne Jones, Lesley Sharp, Amelia Bullmore, Steve Touissant and Mina Anwar

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Unable to get used to the fact she was second choice for the sergeant's job, Rachel punishes Janet for keeping the truth from her, and although Will cheers her up with the news she has been chosen for a vice initiative, the detective is soon stung by Gill's harsh words. Meanwhile, an unconscious baby is admitted to hospital with injuries that do not match his parents' explanation of events, and when an unregistered childminder and her boyfriend enter the equation, it's unclear who had the boy's best interests at heart

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.desc: Part one of two. Primrose falls for a roofing contractor, while the twins prove too much of a handful for their school, prompting a trip to view the facilities on offer at Brockhurst College. Nostalgic comedy drama, starring David Jason and Pam Ferris

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart begins attending a Catholic school and meets a hip-hop-quoting priest who encourages him to convert. Homer tries to return his son to the Protestant Church, but the lure of beer and a pancake dinner causes him to change his faith - so Reverend Lovejoy and Ned Flanders take action. With the guest voice of Liam Neeson

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and stand-in presenter Miquita Oliver are joined by Katherine Parkinson, Youssef Kerkour, Kevin Bridges, Sarah Beeny and Tony Robinson. With music from McFly

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart becomes addicted to junk food and eventually suffers a minor heart attack. Marge and Homer resort to drastic action and send him to a high-security fat camp - which they fund by taking in German lodgers

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In an episode written by Ricky Gervais, who provides the voice of a would-be ladies' man, Homer's obsession with Lenny's new plasma TV leaves him desperate to buy one of his own, so he signs up for a wife-swapping show to win the money. Unfortunately, Marge's new 'husband' soon develops a crush on her

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Selma realises her hopes of ever bearing a child are diminishing and flies to China to adopt a baby. Asked to fill in her husband's name on the application, she pretends to be married to Homer - but the company co-ordinator (guest star Lucy Liu) sees through the deception. Also featuring the voices of Robert Wagner and David Silverman

programme.title: Clueless (1995)

Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud returns to Somerset to see Ed and Vicky Versluys and their cowshed conversion. A year after his last visit and with the house finally complete, Kevin finds out what it's like living in an off-grid home designed for animals

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer look back at loft conversions, remembering two families who wanted to transform their dark and dingy attics in the race for space. In Walthamstow and Preston, two couples are looking at starting families, but lack of space is an issue - and while one would prefer to move on, the other is keen on a loft conversion. As ever, Kirstie brings in the builders, while Phil sees what other properties are available

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George is joined by his friend, master craftsman Will Hardie, to explore the best of Iceland's architecture, from a cool, contemporary lake house and a traditional home made of turf to a treetop hotel room inspired by a Christmas bauble and a stunning, modernist build in the snowy wilderness. Along the way, the design duo also get to grips with mysterious elves, majestic horses, geothermal baths and wild camping

programme.title: Elizabeth: A Life Through a Lens
programme.desc: Documentary examining how Queen Elizabeth II handled a life on screen over the course of her reign. Using rarely-seen footage, and interviews with key royal commentators and historians, the programme charts her life from a princess who was never meant to be Queen until fate intervened, through falling in love and ascending to the throne, to being a young mother and a head of the Commonwealth, and ultimately adapting to the demands of a global audience in the age of mass media

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer

Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, the celebrity bakers attempt decorative choux buns in the signature and tackle financiers in the technical before making a showstopping cake that represents something from their bucket list

programme.title: 60 Days on the Estates
programme.desc: Ed Stafford heads to the Easterhouse estate, six miles east of Glasgow city centre, and discovers that the cost-of-living crisis has hit the locals hard. The city has seen high levels of drug abuse over the years and Ed meets the locals who are living with the effects of it daily. A young man who got hooked on cocaine aged just 14 nearly died of an overdose. Thanks to rehab and the support of his family, he's swapped cocaine for boxing and is enroute to becoming a professional athlete

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

In 2016, 61-year-old retired hair salon owner Philip met former actor Simon, who had a predilection for older men. In 2015, self-confessed 'geezerbird' Lucy was seeking the love of a good woman. Enter recruitment manager Nicola - a woman not afraid to speak her mind

programme.desc: Dispatches follows four pensioners through winter as they struggle to make ends meet with the exceedingly high price of energy and soaring inflation. John, 76, lives alone in Sunderland in the home he used to share with his parents and siblings and spends his nights sat in darkness, afraid his energy bills are too high to turn the lights on. Sixty eight-year-old Doreen has had only two visitors in the 38 years she has lived in her home and goes to bed early to stay warm. In rural Leicestershire, 82-year-old Harry and his wife 77-year-old Christine skip dinner as a desperate attempt at cutting costs

programme.title: Davina McCall's Pill Revolution
programme.desc: In recent years use of the contraceptive pill has reduced, while natural family planning methods have grown in popularity. On social media women are speaking out about side-effects they've put up with as a consequence of putting synthetic hormones into their bodies. Concerned about the choices that are available to her daughters and their friends, Davina investigates the myths and misconceptions that surround contraception and reveals the results of a Channel 4 survey that asked over 4,000 women and people assigned female at birth about the effects of contraception on their mental and physical health

Rocco the Jack Russell has been struggling to find a home, though his bouncy exuberance and love of a good face lick means he could be the perfect match for Zach, who is looking for a dog not fazed by his Tourette's. programme.desc: When elderly teacher Peter Farquhar was found dead at home in the village of Maids Moreton in 2015, it was sad and unexpected, but no one thought it suspicious. But 18 months later, when his neighbour Ann Moore-Martin also fell ill and died, the police decided to look again. They found that Ben Field, a would-be vicar and academic, had recently become part of both of their lives and benefited from their wills. This programme shows that by delving back in time through friends' and loved ones' memories of Peter and Ben's relationship, as well as Peter's diary, the police discovered a story of love and betrayal

The ravenmaster makes sure his birds are ready to interact with members of the public after months in isolation, while the chief curator oversees the launch of a gruesome new attraction commemorating the executions on Tower Hill

programme.title: Inside the Tower of London
programme.desc: As the UK's lockdown relaxes in July, visitors finally return to the Tower as it reopens it gates to the public, and staff have to adjust to a new normal. The new one-way system is up and running, and new yeoman warders Barry Stringer and Darren Hardy have to get back up to speed with their historical facts

programme.title: The Battle of Britain: 3 Days That Saved the Nation
programme.desc: Dan Snow and Kate Humble take to the skies to relive the twists, turns, terror and triumph of the battle that saved Britain. This documentary explores the gripping events of this crucial battle as Britain struggled to stop a Nazi invasion as Dan and Kate uncover the incredible stories of the ground crew, pilots and ordinary Brits and discover the courage and sacrifice, love and loss, of many of those at the heart of the storm

programme.title: Greggs: Secrets of Their Best Bakes
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the secrets of the successful bakery company, as food critic Grace Dent goes behind the scenes to find out how Greggs became Britain's billion pound bakery. Grace is joined by food scientists and chefs to deconstruct some of the chain's most popular products, from pizza slices to vegan sausage rolls, before heading to Newcastle to visit the Greggs' factories to hear their trade secrets and sample some new products

programme.title: When Cruising Goes Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: Nicki Chapman narrates a programme featuring first-hand accounts of disasters at sea, include the first-time passenger who regretted taking to the seas when his 60,000-ton liner crashed into a pier and a tourist boat in Venice. Sightseers find themselves under attack from a group of hungry mammals when a whale-watching trip suddenly gets too close for comfort, while a luxury yacht is struck by lightning

programme.title: Happy Campers: The Caravan Park

programme.title: Rich House, Poor House

She swaps houses, budgets and lives with wealthy Cardiff- based design entrepreneur Nicky Bright and her daughter Morgan, who find out that living on a tight budget can strain any relationship

programme.title: Dodi: Last Days of a Playboy
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the life of Dodi Al-Fayed, revealing the untold story of the man who tragically lost his life alongside Princess Diana in the fateful car accident in 1997. Featuring exclusive interviews and previously untold stories, the film goes beyond the image of a pampered playboy portrayed by the media to reveals the truth about his upbringing and his relationship with his father, how he built a career in Hollywood, and how he ended up romantically linked to the Princess of Wales. Later in the programme, Princess Diana's close confidante, Richard Kay, offers a revelatory new insight into her relationship with Dodi and her state of mind hours before her tragic death

programme.title: Britain's Favourite 80s Songs
programme.desc: A look at the biggest singles of the year, the best pop videos, the artists who appeared in them, and the stories behind the songs. Cheryl Baker reveals how Tina Turner's What's Love Got to Do with It started off as a Bucks Fizz song. Plus, a look at Frankie Goes to Hollywood's controversial Relax, and the hits of Wham!. With contributions from Toyah Willcox, Paul Gambaccini, Carol Decker and Jenny Powell

programme.title: Jay Blades' East End Through Time
programme.desc: Jay Blades explores the fascinating history of London's East End, from the Shoreditch site where Shakespeare performed, to the story of the original Jack the Lad. He starts where London's East End begins, by the Roman city wall, to hear how East of the wall became a place for 'outsiders' in the 1500s, where immoral or forbidden activities would take place like gambling and bear baiting. Heading to St Dunstan's Church in Stepney, Jay discovers how the Great Plague in 1665 devastated the East End's population due to poor living conditions, and is spooked by the fact that thousands of plague victim's bodies still lie in the church's grounds

programme.title: HMP Full Sutton: Evil Behind Bars
programme.desc: Documentary exploring life inside HMP Full Sutton, a men's high security prison in the East Riding of Yorkshire which has been home to some of Britain's most notorious criminals, including serial killer Dennis Nilsen, the Manchester gangster Dale Cregan, and, the so-called railway rapist and serial killer David Mulcahy. The programme reveals the story of a shocking one-man riot at Full Sutton in 2018. and also shares stories from the prison's Beast Wing, where sex offenders are locked up and separated from the other inmates

programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Lightning Thief (2010)
programme.desc: A teenager is shocked to discover he is the son of Greek god Poseidon and has been accused of stealing Zeus's lightning bolt. The youngster is given 14 days to find the culprit and return the missing item before the furious deity instigates an apocalyptic war. Fantasy adventure, starring Logan Lerman, Pierce Brosnan, Brandon T Jackson, Alexandra Daddario, Jake Abel, Sean Bean and Steve Coogan

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3 (2017)
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas (an all-female a cappella singing group) reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour. However, they face a squad who uses both instruments and voices. Final part of the blockbusting comedy trilogy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow

programme.title: Military Wives (2019)
programme.desc: With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the centre of a media sensation and global movement. As unexpected bonds of friendship flourish, music and laughter transform their lives, helping them to overcome their fears for their loved ones in combat. Comedy drama, starring Kristin Scott Thomas, Sharon Horgan and Emma Lowndes

programme.title: Allied (2016)
programme.desc: A daring Canadian intelligence officer falls for a beautiful French resistance fighter during the Second World War. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of conflict. Epic Robert Zemeckis thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Marion Cotillard and Jared Harris

programme.title: Moffie (2019)
programme.desc: A young man in 1981 South Africa must complete his brutal and racist two years of compulsory military service while desperately maintaining the secrecy of his homosexuality. Romantic drama, starring Kai Luke Brummer and Barbara-Mari Immelman. In Afrikaans and English

programme.title: Up For It?
programme.desc: Gerry Hughes joins Jack sailing, and later, Ruaridh Lever-Hogg meets Melissa and they paint together

programme.title: Night Passage (1957)
programme.desc: The black sheep of a family falls in with a gang of outlaws plotting to rob a train operated by his strait-laced brother, but reckons without his sibling's determination to track him down and set him back on the straight and narrow. Western, starring James Stewart, Audie Murphy, Dan Duryea and Brandon de Wilde

programme.title: The Court-Martial of Billy Mitchell (1955)
programme.desc: In the 1920s, an American colonel accuses the war department of criminal negligence for denying the air force the funding it needs - but the powers-that-be still regard aircraft as an irrelevant part of the military, and respond by putting him on trial. Courtroom drama, starring Gary Cooper and Rod Steiger, with Ralph Bellamy and Elizabeth Montgomery

programme.title: Winchester '73 (1950)
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his father's killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally

programme.title: Cat Ballou (1965)
programme.desc: A schoolteacher returns to her home town to find a ruthless railroad developer is trying to snatch her family's land. When her father is murdered by a hitman for refusing to sell his ranch, she resolves to defend the property, enlisting the aid of two small-time crooks and a drunken gunslinger with an equally inebriated horse. Musical comedy Western, starring Jane Fonda and Lee Marvin, with music by Nat King Cole and Stubby Kaye

programme.title: The Post (2017)
programme.desc: In 1971, an American military analyst uncovers the depths of the US government's deceptions about the futility of the Vietnam War, and takes action by copying top-secret documents that would become the Pentagon Papers. Washington Post owner Kay Graham and her editor Ben Bradlee discover The New York Times is preparing an explosive expose on those papers and, determined to compete, set out to publish them first. Steven Spielberg's fact-based drama, starring Meryl Streep, Tom Hanks, Sarah Paulson and Bob Odenkirk

programme.title: Anna (2019)
programme.desc: A young Russian woman who is the victim of domestic abuse reluctantly accepts an offer from the KGB, and soon becomes one of the world's most feared killers. Action thriller written, produced and directed by Luc Besson, and starring Sasha Luss, Helen Mirren, Luke Evans and Cillian Murphy

programme.title: Filth (2013)
programme.desc: A corrupt policeman with a cocaine habit plans to advance his own career by turning colleagues against each other, while also desperately hoping to persuade his ex-wife to take him back. He rapidly loses his grip on reality as the drug use spirals out of control and his web of lies grows increasingly complex. Black comedy, starring James McAvoy, Imogen Poots, Jamie Bell and Jim Broadbent

programme.title: Downsizing (2017)
programme.desc: In a future plagued with overpopulation, a man realises he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall. Alexander Payne's sci-fi comedy, starring Matt Damon and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: The Furies (1950)
programme.desc: The daughter of a ruthlessly ambitious cattle baron is divided between her love for one of his enemies and the prospect of taking over the family ranch when he dies. But when the cruel rancher has one of her friends hanged, she begins plotting his downfall. Western from director Anthony Mann, starring Barbara Stanwyck and Walter Huston

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny (1954)
programme.desc: US Navy officers rebel against their ship's erratic captain during a violent storm at sea, only to face a court martial back on dry land. However, the crew's actions seem to have been justified when evidence questioning the mental stability of their superior is produced. Second World War drama based on Herman Wouk's novel, starring Humphrey Bogart, Jose Ferrer, Fred MacMurray and Van Johnson

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck! (1960)
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama, charting the mission to track down and eliminate the pride of the German fleet, a fearsome battleship devastating British vessels in the North Atlantic, orchestrated by a British naval officer recovering from his wife's death in an air raid. Starring Kenneth More, Dana Wynter, Laurence Naismith and Karel Stepanek

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction (2014)
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots are driven into hiding when the human race turns against them. When rediscovered by a kindly inventor and his daughter, they come out of exile to save the world, battling a new breed of human-created Transformers. These deadly new machines were created to hunt them down, but are now growing independent and intend to make use of technology from the Transformers' home planet in a plot that could threaten all life on Earth. Fourth film in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Mark Wahlberg, Stanley Tucci and Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: White House Down (2013)
programme.desc: A policeman is turned down for his dream job as a secret service bodyguard to the president. While taking his daughter on a tour of the White House, he gets the chance to prove himself when terrorists seize control of the building, putting the head of state's life in his hands. Action thriller, with Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal and James Woods

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon (2016)
programme.desc: An oil rig in the Gulf of Mexico is beset by technical difficulties - but executives from the company behind the project ignore the signs and demand work proceeds as normal, despite warnings from key engineers on site. The situation rapidly gets out of control, leading to the worst environmental disaster in US history. Fact-based drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kurt Russell and John Malkovich

programme.title: Benjamin (2018)
programme.desc: An up-and-coming filmmaker tries to balance a romance with a visiting French music student and the release of his second movie. A lot of time has elapsed since his acclaimed debut and Benjamin is concerned that his follow-up will be a disaster. Writer/director Simon Amstell's comedy drama, starring Colin Morgan, Jack Rowan and Anna Chancellor, with cameos from Mark Kermode and Simon Mayo

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Rayne calls in help from her followers and fellow influencers to make sure Juliet ticks off every item on her bucket list. Cindy worries that Zara may have a change of heart

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Featuring a variety of cats doing strange things, soldiers stuck in the sand and a dog balancing on a rope

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: In the wake of Murray's passing, Adam, Barry and Erica are all back at home to be closer to their mother, and the house is full of Goldberg chaos, which is driving pregnant Erica bonkers. She enlists Beverly's help to clear things out for the baby, while Adam and Barry have to share a bedroom to make room for the baby nursery

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam is worried about how Beverly will handle him going off to college, so he tries to get a dream job right in their hometown

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Some unlikely friends take Adam out for a night in Jenkintown. Joanne quickly realises her new job at the law firm is not what she expected

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Erica's college graduation is completely forgotten and everyone's only interested the imminent baby, she wonders if she even matters any more

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica asks Geoff to take her on a 'babymoon', far away from Beverly, whose mania about the upcoming birth is making her miserable. Adam and Barry learn how to be great uncles

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: A look at what happened after Gordon Ramsay headed to Scottsdale, Arizona, where he met husband-and-wife bistro owners Samy and Amy Bouzaglo, who revealed a shocking contempt for customer feedback. The chef faced the biggest challenge of the series to save Amy's Baking Company - and a media furore unfolded after the episode was broadcast

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Denver, Colorado, where he meets the stubborn owner of Italian restaurant Pantaleone's, who appears to be firmly stuck in the past. Pete maintains he makes the best pizza in town - based on a review from the 1980s - but the fiery chef's own taste test proves the opposite. With Pete's wife Paulette and son Josh threatening to leave, can Gordon get through to him and save the business?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Arvada, Colorado, where a husband and wife have allowed their restaurant to fall into disrepair. Randy's hoarding is out of control, while Alexa, who runs the kitchen, has a lot to learn. To make matters worse, the Old Neighborhood is one of the filthiest eateries the fiery chef has ever seen, and only one of the biggest transformations of the series can save the business

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Queens, New York, where he meets a family torn apart by the stress of running failing Greek restaurant Kati Allo. Husband-and-wife owners Manny and Christine are on the brink of divorce, while their daughter Evelyn is caught in the middle and at her wits' end

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pilot episode of the comedy about scientists and their friendship with a down-to-earth neighbour. When aspiring actress Penny moves into Leonard's apartment block, he is immediately smitten, but Sheldon warns him that he runs the risk of a broken heart if he tries to woo her. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon helps Leonard drop off a parcel for Penny, but when he sees how messy her flat is, he tries to do a good deed - which is not well received. Johnny Gale, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset to learn Penny is dating someone, so his friends encourage him to seek a new romance by asking another woman out. Sara Gilbert appears alongside her Rosen co-star Johnny Gale

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is fired for being disrespectful to his boss, and explores new activities in a bid to find a purpose in life other than physics, but Leonard takes drastic action to restore him to his old self. Laurie Metcalf guest stars as Sheldon's mother

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard fears he is wasting his time with Penny and ends up spending the night with fellow scientist Leslie. However, he is disappointed when she later tells him she was only interested in a one-night stand. Meanwhile, Sheldon frets over a change to his hamburger routine. Starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny hosts a Halloween costume party, which proves a worthy test for the boys' social skills. During the event, Leonard has a run-in with Penny's ex-boyfriend. Kaley Cuoco, Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny is forced to take Howard's place in the boys' video-game night while he is otherwise engaged with one of her friends. Simon Helberg, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the last-ever episode of the US sitcom, there's an end and a beginning as the gang travel together into an uncharted future. Howard and Bernadette go away on a trip without their children for the first time, Leonard and Penny try to keep a secret, Sheldon and Amy stick together, and Raj makes a new friend

programme.title: Puss in Boots (2011)
programme.desc: The swashbuckling feline joins forces with a cunning thief and a treacherous old friend to steal a magical golden goose from a giant's castle. He must save the day when it transpires that their actions have unleashed a terrible danger on his home town. Animated comedy spin-off from the Shrek movies, with the voices of Antonio Banderas and Salma Hayek

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back (2016)
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwick's blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Child's novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: A romp through the Naked Attraction archive to catch up with dates that led to full-on romances - as well as some that turned out to be a disaster. They include Wolverhampton DJ Darryl from series one, who found his partner in Maria, and Scottish bombshell Amira from series five, who gives the lowdown on what really happened between her and Ste after their night of passion

programme.desc: The Dunphys and Pritchetts head Down Under for a family holiday so Phil can fulfil his mother's wish that he should one day return to the country where he was conceived. Rhys Darby (Flight of the Conchords) guest stars

programme.desc: The Emmy-winning comedy returns - as do Cameron and Mitchell, who are back from honeymoon and determined to keep the romance alive. Meanwhile, Leonard realises he can manipulate Penny into feeling sorry for him when his mother publishes a reveal-all book about his childhood problems. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: Naked Attraction

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Dating show hosted by Anna Richardson in which two singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who are revealed to them one body part at a time. In the first edition, Aina, a music producer from London, wants to find someone adventurous who she can have a deeper connection with, while Guildford-based designer Mal - who has dated men and women - is curious to see who she will be drawn to when all options are laid bare before her. programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht

To make matters worse, the Old Neighborhood is one of the filthiest eateries the fiery chef has ever seen, and only one of the biggest transformations of the series can save the business

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When Tina struggles to keep up with her job at Calvin's garage due to her burgeoning baking business, he faces a tough decision

Ed's bold ideas are held up by planning problems and once the build starts, Rachel and James agree to move out so progress can be quicker, but it has to be completed in just eight weeks. Knocking down the garage and replacing it with a dramatic, double-height extension to give the living space a real sense of drama is one of the potential solutions, although the budget of 60,000 is set to test Ed's skill to the limit

With a baby on the way, the couple are desperate to make their new home into something special - so George kicks off by knocking a huge hole in the ceiling for extra headspace. Will his other ideas prove just as exciting? The architect also visits a 200-year-old farmhouse on the edge of the Peak District, where he faces difficulties as the owners are reluctant to let him knock down any walls

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Children's food educator Beth Stephens hosts the first dinner party in Lowestoft, Suffolk, where she plans to impress her guests - caravan site owner Ray, beauty therapist Polly, housing officer Jonalt and ASBO officer Rachel - with locally sourced seasonal food. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Holly Venning hosts the fourth dinner party from Cumbria and the food marketing manager wants to show her love for her home county through her menu. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Heir Hunters

programme.title: Heir Hunters

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo learns about a successful 19th-century recycling industry in the textile town of Batley in West Yorkshire. He also discovers how the railways boosted the county's rhubarb trade and meets the great-great-granddaughter of George Bradshaw

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo concludes his journey from Newcastle to the Leicestershire town of Melton Mowbray. Along the way he learns the secrets of Stilton cheese, discovers how trains transformed the traditional British pursuit of fox-hunting and tries to make a pork pie

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on the next leg of his journey, travelling from London Bridge through Kent and around the scenic south coast to Hastings. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

Michael hears about her happy childhood and how she later found sanctuary there, when King Edward VIII abdicated and she and Prince Albert unexpectedly became king and queen of the United Kingdom

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo is at Elgin's port, the coastal town of Lossiemouth, where the Labour Party's first prime minister James Ramsay MacDonald was born. Nearby, Michael finds a remote boarding school established in the 1930s and famous today both for its unusual ideas and its royal former pupils. His penultimate stop is Inverness, where he uncovers the work of female photographer MEM Donaldson, who documented a Highland way of life that was rapidly disappearing. Michael's journey ends at Loch Ness, where he joins a Deep Scan research team scouring the deep for signs of the elusive monster

programme.title: World War Weird
programme.desc: Featuring a look at sightings of UFOs during the Second World War, a US plan to use bats against Japan's cities, and a German attempt to persuade British POWs to change sides

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Railway Collection
programme.desc: Steeplejack and amateur historian Fred Dibnah explains how diesel-powered locomotives replaced steam trains, leading to the creation of the Railway Preservation Society

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Railway Collection
programme.desc: Steeplejack and amateur historian Fred Dibnah examines historic railways and engineering projects undertaken by the likes of Stephenson and Hackworth

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo ventures deep into the Black Forest, where he discovers how Hansel and Gretel helped to unify the German nation. A masterclass in carving cuckoo clocks demonstrates how the nation's reputation for quality and reliability in manufacturing was established. Later, at Goettingen University, the former politician discovers two sides of student life at the turn of the 20th century - the duelling fraternities and the ground-breaking scientists who laid the foundation of Germany's world-class transport technology

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey across Ireland, travelling from Navan to Mullingar. Along the way, he gets up to speed with modern archaeology in County Meath, where he uncovers a controversial Victorian dig at the sacred Hill of Tara. Later, he investigates leaping salmon in Leixslip, and in Mullingar, bangs the drum for the town's traditional marching band

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his Irish journey from Dromod to Sligo. Along the way he discovers how the landscape inspired the poet WB Yeats and learns to make a potato pancake

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo visits Cornwall's county town, Truro, heading to the historic estate of Trewithen, whose gardens were stocked from China by professional plant hunters commissioned by its owner. The Atlantic Coast branch line carries Michael north to Newquay, where he discovers a pioneering surfer and braves the waves on a belly board. In the nearby village of St Mawgan, Michael is introduced to the ancient Cornish sport of 'wrassling', which surged in popularity between the wars as part of a Cornish Celtic revival

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a factory in rural Somerset that produces one million pots of yoghurt every 24 hours, and meets the herd of cows that produce the milk. programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Japan
programme.desc: The actress heads to the island of Shikoku hoping to gain a better understanding of Japanese Buddhism. She then takes a bullet train to another island - Kyushu - where she finds the Henn Na Hotel, the world's first robot hotel. At Nagasaki, she visits Shiroyama Elementary school, one of the only buildings to survive the atomic bomb dropped on the city in 1945. Joanna then travels to Sakurajima, one of the country's most active volcanoes, before heading to the islands of Okinawa where one of the bloodiest battles of the Second World War was fought

In 2020, Kirstie and Phil met Elliot and James who were looking to find a home they could share with four bedrooms and an open plan entertaining space in London. programme.desc: Ed Stafford heads to the Easterhouse estate, six miles east of Glasgow city centre, and discovers that the cost-of-living crisis has hit the locals hard. The city has seen high levels of drug abuse over the years and Ed meets the locals who are living with the effects of it daily. A young man who got hooked on cocaine aged just 14 nearly died of an overdose. Thanks to rehab and the support of his family, he's swapped cocaine for boxing and is enroute to becoming a professional athlete

programme.desc: Thirteen of Britain's brightest and most ambitious chefs compete against one another for a jaw-dropping prize - their own restaurant in one of Britain's most historic hotels. Set within top central London hotel The Langham, the competition is judged the venue's head chef Michel Roux Jr, alongside pastry supremo and hospitality consultant Ravneet Gill and leading global restaurateur Mike Reid. The contenders are tasked to take on a range of epic challenges designed to test the skills they need to survive in the elite world of five-star dining

programme.title: Extraordinary Escapes with Sandi Toksvig
programme.desc: Sandi is joined by Eddie Izzard on an Irish adventure as they visit three holiday hideaways in Counties Clare, Kerry and Cork and bond over homemade apple crumble. Their first stop in County Clare is a miniature modern marvel called Teeroneer, a timber-clad, prize-winning property with a sunken kitchen that Sandi just can't resist cooking in. From there the pair head to Ark Ranch Treehouse. Hand-built by one woman, Sandi and Eddie are charmed by the sense of childhood adventure they feel. Finally, they head to Lost Cottage in the mountains and lakes of County Kerry. A classic fusion of old and new, the remote rental gives the pair an excuse for Sandi to take Eddie on her very first fishing trip

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Seventy-year-old Jenny is brought in with a suspected stroke, and doctors must confirm the diagnosis and decide whether she is still in time to receive life-changing treatment. Her husband Roy shares the difficult experiences they've faced together and describes Jenny as the rock of the family. Ronnie has come into St George's with severe lower back pain. Doctors assess whether the 29-year-old's pain is due to his kidney stones or something more serious. Ronnie is accompanied by his girlfriend Anneline, who reflects on the similarities between Ronnie and her late father

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&Bers enjoy the great outdoors at Eden Valley Glamping in Cumber, a site with a back-to-basics approach - but a dusty bathroom and damp duvets put a crimp in the guests' stay

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Business manager Ross Chapman hosts the first dinner party in west Lancashire, but encounters a string of culinary disasters while preparing his fish-themed menu. However, he still finds time for a manicure and bubble bath before the meal, and it is the behaviour of one of his guests, rather than his burnt tart, that causes the most embarrassment

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lisa and Jesue begin the contest in this episode from Cambridge and Peterborough with an international menu. A tough crusted tart doesn't impress bickering partners Paul and Gareth and the presentation is also lacking for posh millennials Georgie and Alex. On day two Georgie and Alex cook up recipes devised by Alex's mother. Finally, Paul and Gareth plan an Italian menu. Using crystals and visualisation techniques, they endeavour to serve their duck breast medium rare and hope that their mousse is fluffy. However, things fail to go to plan

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman heads to northern Tenerife to help Edinburgh couple John Clark and David Cameron find a dwelling that will eventually become their retirement home. With their wedding just weeks away, the pair have 100,000 to find somewhere that will accommodate a future mother-in-law as well as five visiting children

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: A couple with very different ideas of how they want to spend their retirement seek advice from Jonnie Irwin and Jasmine Harman. While husband Tony plans on returning to the Wirral in Merseyside, his wife Karin hopes to move to southern Spain, where her sister has already settled

programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Country Lives
programme.desc: James and Jodie set out to renovate an old dairy farm's dilapidated farmhouse. However, given it is such an overwhelming challenge it is difficult to know where to start

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: In Somercotes, Derbyshire, Simon O'Brien pairs designer Jaspal with painter and decorator Chantelle. They are given six months to transform a property

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien and Henry Cole head to Buckinghamshire, where their restorations include a pair of manhole covers, a water pump and a beehive

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: This competition takes place in and around Leeds, where the first to host is 24-year-old digital account manager Alice. Alice has never held a dinner party before, but she's hoping her family favourites will hit the spot and win her the 1,000 prize. She's hoping to impress Danielle, Andy, Lynne and Matt. With gob-smacking revelations, cringe-worthy party tricks and a ginormous Pavlova, can Alice manage to walk away with the honours?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Night two of the competition in Leeds, and company director Andy hopes to win with a menu of restaurant-inspired fare, but Alice and Danielle are more impressed with his Ferrari

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fun-loving student Danielle hosts the third dinner party in Leeds, hoping a high-calorie menu will see her emerge victorious. She even serves dessert wearing her wedding dress

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fun-loving student Danielle hosts the third dinner party in Leeds, hoping a high-calorie menu will see her emerge victorious. She even serves dessert wearing her wedding dress

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It's the final day of the competition in and around Leeds, and jeweller Lynne hopes her night will sparkle with a menu consisting of her own creations. While talk at the table turns to plastic surgery and Botox, Andy and Danielle aren't too impressed with Lynne's food

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lee Juggurnauth jets off to Torrevieja on Spain's Costa Blanca to help ex-engineer Ash and retired banker Anila find their dream holiday home on a budget of 135,000

programme.title: Ancient Egypt by Train with Alice Roberts
programme.desc: Alice arrives in Cairo by train and follows in the footsteps of Victorian Egyptologist Amelia Edwards. The journey takes her to the Great Pyramids, where she is allowed to climb deep inside to see the tomb and sarcophagus of the pharaoh Khufu. In Saqqara she learns how and why the pyramids came about, and even finds time for a spot of shopping in a Cairo souk

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Matt Lucas welcomes TV presenter Anneka Rice, comedian John Bishop, pop star Nadine Coyle and wheelchair basketball player-turned-presenter Ade Adepitan into the tent. Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, the celebrity bakers attempt decorative choux buns in the signature and tackle financiers in the technical before making a showstopping cake that represents something from their bucket list

programme.title: 60 Days on the Estates
programme.desc: Ed Stafford heads to the Easterhouse estate, six miles east of Glasgow city centre, and discovers that the cost-of-living crisis has hit the locals hard. The city has seen high levels of drug abuse over the years and Ed meets the locals who are living with the effects of it daily. A young man who got hooked on cocaine aged just 14 nearly died of an overdose. Thanks to rehab and the support of his family, he's swapped cocaine for boxing and is enroute to becoming a professional athlete

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Britain's Got Talent, The Thief, His Wife and the Canoe, Romeo and Duet, Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof, The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up To Cancer, Roar, Stacey Dooley Sleeps Over, and Expedition Bigfoot

programme.title: Sarah Beeny Vs Cancer
programme.desc: The presenter explores breast cancer treatment in the UK, with filming starting on her first day of treatment, three weeks after her initial diagnosis. The programme also captures the experiences of her husband and children, charting the impact a cancer treatment can have on a whole family, and also follows Sarah as she reflects on her mother's death from the same condition 40 years previously

programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Life in the Country
programme.desc: Highlights from the series, focusing on Sarah, her husband Graham and their four boys as they settle into their new rural family life

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud returns to Somerset to see Ed and Vicky Versluys and their cowshed conversion. A year after his last visit and with the house finally complete, Kevin finds out what it's like living in an off-grid home designed for animals

programme.title: Grand Designs: The Streets
programme.desc: Tom and Lori from London decide to leave the city and build a home at Graven Hill in Oxfordshire to give them a taste of the countryside and allow them to embark on an architectural adventure. They plan to build as much as they can themselves while leaving the groundworks and frame to the professionals but before they can begin they discover the groundworks are out of alignment with the frame

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at Fernie Castle in Letham, Fife, where owners Neil and Mary Blackburn hope to impress their guests with their traditional 15th century B&B

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Single mother Lindsay Pulford hosts the second party in west Lancashire, hoping to impress her fellow diners with a Caribbean-themed night. However, as soon as the guests arrive, they begin to regale her with reminders of her antics the previous evening

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Couples compete in Bognor Regis, West Sussex, with Carl and Brianha kicking off proceedings with an evening inspired by the glitz and glamour of the French Riviera. Day two sees down-to-earth couple Mark and Lisa cook up some collapsing fish cakes and a Thai curry that proves too hot for some. Finally it's Justin and Karen's turn with a fine dining menu that the pair are convinced will deliver them the 1,000 prize

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Sue and Stacey Jones, who have a budget of 72,000, search for a holiday home that will also generate a rental income on Spain's Costa del Sol. Laura Hamilton shows them a selection of properties available for purchase

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Property experts Jonnie Irwin and Jasmine Harman meet Hilary from Cheshire, who has inherited a sum of money and wants to invest in a holiday rental property she and her family can also use. They help her decide between Rhyl in north Wales, which is close to her home, or Almeria in Spain, where income will potentially be higher and the sunshine more frequent

programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Country Lives
programme.desc: Dave and Lynn need help with the layout and decoration of their living room, while Kay plans her first ever craft fair

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: A banker and a builder join forces to renovate a decrepit family home in Garforth, Leeds. When one of the pair struggles to commit to the work, the pressure rises for the other

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien and Henry Cole are in Gloucestershire, where they upcycle a horse yoke, a hay trailer and a fertiliser funnel

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hair and beauty tutor April Richards hosts the first dinner party in Birmingham. She plans a starter of zebra meat, but the dish does not go down well with employment adviser Paz Thakrar, who is a strict vegetarian and thinks that even eating vegetables is cruel

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Scientist John Fennel hosts the second party in Birmingham, and decides to prepare an ambitious menu that makes use of his skills in the lab. His culinary experiments include the use of soda-siphoned fish batter, a specially crafted fire-maker, a tandoor chimney, and ice-cream made with nitrogen oxide

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The third dinner party in Birmingham is hosted by banker Vanessa Erigbogbo, who describes herself as a brilliant cook. She hopes to impress her guests with a classy menu of lobster, confit of duck, and fried grasshopper canapes, but forgets to cater for a vegetarian diner

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Strict vegetarian Paz Thakrar hosts the penultimate dinner party in Birmingham, but his meat-eating guests show little enthusiasm for the menu and are further displeased by the idea of a karaoke session afterwards

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Insolvency administrator Toni Shukla hosts the final dinner party in Birmingham, and appears to have a good chance of securing the 1,000 prize after her rivals' unsuccessful evenings. However, her lack of cookery knowledge threatens to scupper her hopes of gaining the most points

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jean Johansson goes house-hunting around the coastal town of Olbia on Sardinia with outdoor sports enthusiasts Katrina and Colin. They've been coming to the island for 18 years and would ideally love a holiday home big enough for them and their three grown-up children to enjoy. With a budget of 135,000, they're hoping Jean can find them perfection, and she's ready for action lining up five great options for the pair to consider

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Matt Lucas welcomes TV presenter Anneka Rice, comedian John Bishop, pop star Nadine Coyle and wheelchair basketball player-turned-presenter Ade Adepitan into the tent. Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, the celebrity bakers attempt decorative choux buns in the signature and tackle financiers in the technical before making a showstopping cake that represents something from their bucket list

programme.title: Titanic (1997)
programme.desc: A party of explorers studying the sunken remains of the famous liner meets an elderly woman who was a passenger on the ill-fated maiden voyage. She recounts how she boarded the ship while on the brink of being forced into marriage by her family, and was stopped from killing herself by a penniless artist. She fell in love with her saviour, but the disaster on the horizon meant their time together was doomed to be short. James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic drama, starring Kate Winslet, Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates and Bill Paxton

programme.title: Davina McCall's Pill Revolution
programme.desc: In recent years use of the contraceptive pill has reduced, while natural family planning methods have grown in popularity. On social media women are speaking out about side-effects they've put up with as a consequence of putting synthetic hormones into their bodies. Concerned about the choices that are available to her daughters and their friends, Davina investigates the myths and misconceptions that surround contraception and reveals the results of a Channel 4 survey that asked over 4,000 women and people assigned female at birth about the effects of contraception on their mental and physical health

programme.title: Sarah Beeny Vs Cancer
programme.desc: The presenter explores breast cancer treatment in the UK, with filming starting on her first day of treatment, three weeks after her initial diagnosis. The programme also captures the experiences of her husband and children, charting the impact a cancer treatment can have on a whole family, and also follows Sarah as she reflects on her mother's death from the same condition 40 years previously

programme.desc: The guests check in to the Cadillac Kustomz Hotel on the Isle of Bute, where the retro design proves popular but the Scottish-American breakfast seems to get lost in translation

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler conduct an embarrassing interview with a potential sperm donor after learning they cannot conceive a baby naturally. programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Part one of two. The gang visits Barbados to hear Ross address a convention, but Chandler manages to destroy the only copy of his keynote speech. Joey and Rachel impersonate pharmacists to infiltrate a medical conference offering free drinks, while Mike arrives unexpectedly and proposes to Phoebe

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Part two of two. On the first hot day since their arrival in Barbados, the pals attend Ross's lecture, which is well received by his colleagues. Ross and Joey experience a change of fortunes, while Monica and Mike take part in a marathon ping-pong match, leaving Chandler irritated and Phoebe smitten

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Joey struggle to find the words to tell Ross about their kiss in Barbados, while Phoebe makes the alarming discovery that Mike has a girlfriend. Starring Jennifer Aniston, Matt LeBlanc and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tries to put on a brave face and invites Joey and Rachel to dinner with him and Charlie, but gets drunk and makes an embarrassing scene. Frank Jr tries to talk Phoebe into taking care of one of the triplets, while Chandler and Monica learn more about adoption

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross goes to a spray-tanning salon, but his failure to follow the instructions leaves him with a complexion he was not looking for. Joey and Rachel prepare to sleep together for the first time, but the night proves more awkward than romantic. Guest starring Jennifer Coolidge

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler decide to delay their trip to Vermont to celebrate Emma's first birthday, but the party takes an unexpected turn with the delivery of a risque birthday cake. Comedy, guest starring Elliott Gould

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Christina Applegate reprises her role as Rachel's clueless sister Amy, who offers to babysit Emma and ends up giving the unfortunate child a makeover. Phoebe inadvertently spoils Mike's anniversary surprise, and Joey writes a letter of recommendation for the Bings. Comedy, guest starring Christina Applegate and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear guest stars as Charlie's Nobel Prize-winning old flame, who is overseeing a grant Ross desperately wants. Rachel and Monica try to foist on each other one of Phoebe's peculiar paintings. Comedy, guest starring Aisha Tyler (Archer) and Greg Kinnear (I Don't Know How She Does It)

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Ant Horsley is one of a team of officers pursuing a car suspected of being linked to the drugs trade, and a high-speed and hazardous chase ensues across the Peak District. Ant is also involved when another car is pulled over near a busy junction and its driver is arrested, with police finding what they suspect to be rocks of crack cocaine and heroin parcelled up in the car

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Craig Dawes attends a fatal collision involving a motorcycle and car, where he and Sgt Matt Edwards secure the site for crash investigators, who try to piece together what happened. Sgt Scott Riley spots and follows a biker he thinks looks suspicious, with a computer check indicating the bike is not licensed or insured

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Around 11,000 automatic number plate recognition cameras continually monitor vehicles on Britain's roads. With ANPR readers installed in their patrol cars, it is a valuable tool for Derbyshire's traffic cops, helping them track down dangerous offenders and illegal cars, vans and lorries. Karl Jackson is alerted to a possible disqualified driver when a passing car triggers his ANPR system, but the vehicle fails to stop and a pursuit begins

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Andy Swift is on the lookout for a high-value car stolen from a dealership after being taken for a test drive, while he also searches for builder's van taken from a driveway while the owner popped briefly inside to collect his tools and equipment. PC Dave Shaw is patrolling on a night shift when he follows a car suspected of being used in house burglary

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Andy Lawson is involved in a high-speed chase through a housing estate, Kev Salter carries out an early morning raid on a suspected drug dealer's house, and a drunk driver is grumpy when pulled over, then irate when he is arrested

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Damo and the firearms team tackle a gunman at a supermarket, while Gareth engages in a headlong, death-defying pursuit along roads, pavements and back allies. Elsewhere, an offender makes his getaway from Kev and Mark, and Jimmy Grieves faces down five angry men on an estate in Hartlepool

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Kev Salter goes on three drug busts, accompanied on two of them by newcomer Pete Tate, while Ben Sutcliffe shows presenter Rick Edwards the ropes, taking him on a fast-paced ride through Taser, method of entry and firearms training. Plus, a look back at two classic stories, showing the lengths to which people will go to hide their narcotics and how the police managed to gain access to a suspected drugs den

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (2014)

programme.desc: Monica and Chandler travel to Ohio to meet the mother of the baby they plan to adopt. programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Phoebe see Chandler getting into a car with a mystery woman and follow them to a large house in the suburbs. They tell Monica of their fears and are shocked to hear the truth. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston, Lisa Kudrow and Matthew Perry

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The road crime team leads a county lines drugs crackdown in Chesterfield, capturing three suspects believed to be ferrying crack cocaine and heroin into Derbyshire on a regular basis. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston returns with a focus on officers on patrol in North Yorkshire, beginning as they clamp down on young drivers causing danger on the county's roads. programme.desc: Kev Salter takes drastic action to stop a vehicle he suspects has class-A drugs on board, while a nasty street fight leads to a Taser being drawn.
