programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Hoppsy goes after a disqualified motorist who hurdles two fences in his attempts to get away, Damo deploys a stinger in a bid to stop a drunk driver and Kev solves the mystery of a car abandoned in a field. Plus, Spike deals with a drug driver with a mouthy girlfriend and Lee has a strange weekend involving a burning car, two inebriated men and a large garden gnome

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A reckless car thief seems intent on causing carnage, while the pursuit of an unlicensed driver through a housing estate has grave consequences. Inspector Ed Turner turns up more than he bargains for when the pursuit of a suspected heroin user takes a turn for the worse, and elsewhere officers face one of the biggest challenges of their careers when a stolen JCB goes on the rampage

programme.desc: Documentary following the work of enforcement agents as they execute High Court writs on behalf of people desperate to recover money they are owed

programme.desc: Mother of four Mikki has detected a small lump in her breast, so she comes in to see Dr Sonia Ashraf, while Dr Aireen Razak treats Caroline, who has discovered a knotty lump on her collar bone that has got her fearing the worst. Down the corridor, young father Hosea is concerned he may have suffered a mini-stroke, while away from the surgery, paramedic Sophie Daley visits the home of Parkinson's disease sufferer Robert, who has developed a worrying chest infection

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: Staff at Barnsley Hospital's casualty department as they work together to help the ill and injured of South Yorkshire. There's a bedside view of heart attacks, road traffic collisions and allergic reactions as the team treats multiple injuries caused by objects ranging from chainsaws to tractors and everything in between

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe's big day arrives, but wedding planner Monica and stand-in father of the bride Joey take their roles a little too seriously. To make matters worse, a blizzard hits New York and one of Mike's ushers is indisposed, forcing Ross and Chandler to step into the breach

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey persuades Phoebe to teach him French for an important audition, while Monica and Chandler show a pregnant Erica the sights of New York and learn more about the baby's possible father. Guest starring Anna Faris and Ron Leibman

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel heads to a restaurant for a job interview, only to find herself sitting at a table within earshot of her current boss. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler go house-hunting and Phoebe decides to change her name. Guest starring Paul Rudd and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Officers in York are forced into one of their most dangerous pursuits after a report of a stolen car travelling at recklessly high speeds towards the city centre. A lone cop in the Dales at night urgently needs back-up to prevent a dangerous speeding drunk who is determined to flee, while police receive a tip-off claiming a man drove home from a pub drunk after refusing to pay his bill

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A prolific car thief with a string of convictions under his belt crashes and rolls a stolen car at over 100mph, while in Harrogate the hunt for a cloned car and disqualified driver leads to a high-speed pursuit. The suspect leaps from the moving car and leaves it driverless, heading downhill straight towards a busy main road during the rush hour

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Ortis Deley follows officers from Cleveland and Durham's specialist unit as they embark on a series of operations targeting crimes connected to narcotics. From chasing down people driving under the influence of drugs to raiding cannabis factories, Sgt Kevin Salter and his crew take on the drug game's key players in the north-east of England. Showcasing all the action of one eventful night, Ortis is in the thick of it as the interceptors ultimately seize more than 500,000 of contraband

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The work of Cheshire's high-speed police interception unit, whose patch is one of the UK's most affluent areas. In the first edition, Tom tries to stop a suspected petrol thief who is not willing to pull over, Bucko and Chris meet a mouthy driver who refuses to come quietly, Mike helps to carry out a textbook tactical pursuit and containment, and Jim deals with a drunk, foul-mouthed racist who has bladder-control issues

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Gordo and Dan use their Tasers to help arrest a knife-wielding teenager, Jim leads five units in the boxing in of a car suspected of carrying drugs, and Tim and Tom tackle a mouthy drunk who has crashed his van

programme.title: Call the Bailiffs: Time to Pay Up

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Marilyn wants out, Eden's song is a hit, Remi has big ideas for Lyrik, and Mali takes pity on John's revamp

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Kirby loses her song-writing mojo, and it remains to be seen whether Marilyn has what it takes to fight a powerful corporation. Lyrik might be hijacking Bree and Remi's romance

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The medics explore the theory that a 'broken heart' can cause patients to suffer very real mental and physical problems. Dr Wyne chats to Adolphus, who is struggling to come to terms with the recent death of his wife and best friend within a few weeks of each other. Dr Qamar pays a home visit to Elsie, a sprightly octogenarian whose health has deteriorated since the death of her husband, while Dr Razak treats young Emily, who has inherited a rare genetic condition from her late father which weakens the muscles of the heart

programme.title: 22 Kids & Counting

Noel and Sue agree to travel to the Sunshine State to look at some properties, but news of the impending trip sends the Ra rumour mill into overdrive, resulting in the biggest ever Radford family trip abroad

Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Robert Conrad and Philip Bruns

However, the crumpled cop sees through the ruse and in the process reveals he is something of a wine buff himself. Detective drama, with Peter Falk, Donald Pleasence and Julie Harris

Detective drama, with Peter Falk. Patrick McGoohan co-stars and directs

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: An agelong actress grows desperate to recapture her glory days and resorts to murdering her husband and making it look like suicide. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Janet Leigh, Sam Safe and John Payne

programme.title: Columbo

Crime drama, starring Peter Falk and Robert Vaughn, directed by Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: London's Weekend
programme.desc: A chance to catch up on the week's headlines and a taste of what to see and do in London this weekend

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: Mudlarking the Thames
programme.desc: Nicola White unearths the river's historical treasures

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert takes a trip down the Wye, beginning in the Cambrian Mountains. He observes the mating behaviour of the sea lamprey and spots the varied birdlife along the river, including a colony of sand martins tending their young and all three species of British wagtail. He also meets Richard Davies, who has boosted water vole numbers in the area, and learns about Environment Agency scientist John Taylor's efforts to save the freshwater pearl mussel

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert is on the west coast of Scotland to explore one of the world's rarest habitats - temperate rainforest. He discovers the skittish sika deer and meets a lichenologist who shows him a wealth of species that thrive in Argyll's wet, humid climate. Ray also observes the nest of two ospreys and finds out why the reintroduction of the European beaver is benefiting other wildlife

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton sets out to visit some of the many islands that lay off the coastline. Heading to Foula and Fair Isle - the most remote island communities in Britain - he makes a nerve-racking visit to 'Da Snekk o' da Smallie' - a pothole in the cliffs of Foula that leads through to the Atlantic shore on the island, and learns about the beautiful knitting patterns that have made Fair Isle famous around the word

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton turns his attention to the country's landlocked islands. He travels to Loch Lomond to get a bird's-eye view of an iconic beauty spot, before gaining an insight into the lives of its residents

programme.title: Lilies of the Field (1963)
programme.desc: Travelling handyman Homer Smith stops at a remote farm in the Arizona desert to get water when his car overheats, and encounter a group of German, Austrian and Hungarian. He agrees to repair a roof for them, but the mother superior has a bigger task in store for him. starring an Oscar-winning Sidney Poitier, with Francesca Jarvis, Lisa Mann and Isa Crino

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying (1956)
programme.desc: A psychopathic college student is horrified to learn his girlfriend is pregnant, threatening his chances of being accepted into her well-to-do family. In a fit of fury, he murders her and makes it look as if she had committed suicide - only for her sister to show up, taking an uncomfortable degree of interest in the manner of her sibling's death. Thriller, with Robert Wagner, Joanne Woodward, Jeffrey Hunter and Mary Astor

programme.title: San Demetrio London
programme.desc: The story of a British merchant ship in an Atlantic convoy in 1940 that was left disabled and at the mercy of patrolling U-boats. The crew must keep afloat and out of harm's way

programme.title: Dance With Me, Henry (1956)
programme.desc: The owners of a struggling amusement park get mixed up with the Mob as one struggles to pay his debts and the other faces losing his adopted kids. Comedy, with Abbott and Costello

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing Crystal Palace and Shoreditch. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Tabernacle Choir: Music and Words
programme.desc: Music and inspiration for everyday living from one of the world's most acclaimed choirs featuring regular guest artists

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: Dr Russell fights to save the life of a woman whose husband has been plagued by visions of the destruction of Moonbase Alpha. Sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau, Barbara Bain and Pamela Stephenson

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert travels along the south coast of the Isle of Wight. He visits a shipwreck that has become a natural habitat for marine species such as the conger eel and spiny spider crab, and with the help of a local angler goes in search of smooth-hound sharks. Back on dry land, Ray finds out how the preserved footprints of an iguanodon reveal the way the dinosaur walked, observes a colony of ravens, and is introduced to the rare Glanville fritillary butterfly

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert explores the Isles of Scilly off the Cornish coast, where mild temperatures create an ideal habitat for species of wildlife normally associated with warmer climes. Exotic plants like the South African Hottentot fig thrive in the area, while an abundance of insects, including the rare red-barbed ant, means that migrant birds such as barn swallows use the islands as a source of sustenance

programme.title: Cracks (2009)
programme.desc: A nonconformist teacher at a girls' boarding school in 1930s Britain is an outsider among her colleagues but adored by her pupils. When a Spanish student who also revels in her outsider status arrives, the teacher becomes dangerously fascinated with her, sparking uncontrollable jealousy among the pupils. Drama, starring Eva Green and Juno Temple

programme.title: Radio On (1979)
programme.desc: A DJ drives from London to Bristol to investigate his brother's death, encountering a succession of strange people along the way - but his interest in solving the mystery begins to wane as the journey unfolds. Road movie, starring David Beames, Lisa Kreuzer and Sting

programme.title: Spaced Out (1979)
programme.desc: Four friends stumble across a crashed spaceship, which is crewed by three female aliens and their robot sidekick. The extraterrestrials force the humans to help them repair their vessel, but get distracted by their first close encounter with men. Sci-fi comedy, starring Barry Stokes and Tony Maiden

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing Brixton and Harmondsworth for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours for locals and tourists, exploring Elephant & Castle and Croydon. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital

programme.title: Pocket Dragon Adventures
programme.desc: A group of very small dragons live with a kindly old wizard, they're not big enough to fly but that doesn't stop them having many adventures

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: Ling goes on the rampage in Singapore when she steals the Guardian of the Rabbit Temple's Power Band

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world.

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Stone Age

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: Department S
programme.desc: A scientist steals a sample of a deadly poison gas, and threatens to destroy London unless his plans for world peace are enacted. Guest starring Anthony Hopkins

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: A new manager arrives at the recently built Whitbury leisure centre - but things get off to a shaky start when he selects a poolside attendant who cannot swim. First episode of the comedy, starring Chris Barrie

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay.

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The gang argue over who should rescue the kidnapped daughter of a village headman. Pigsy sneaks out behind the others' backs to look for her himself, but the remaining three friends soon follow his trail

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying (1956)
programme.desc: A psychopathic college student is horrified to learn his girlfriend is pregnant, threatening his chances of being accepted into her well-to-do family. Thriller, with Robert Wagner, Joanne Woodward, Jeffrey Hunter and Mary Astor

programme.title: Lady Godiva Rides Again (1951)
programme.desc: A humble beauty contest winner finds herself launched on the road to stardom, but soon discovers a side to showbusiness she had no idea existed. Comedy, with Diana Dors, Dennis Price, George Cole and Joan Collins in her big-screen debut

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Space 1999

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Little Matters: Turtles
programme.desc: Turtles are slow, calm, gentle creatures - but not always

programme.title: The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin
programme.desc: Reggie takes his family to a safari park and finds the atmosphere in the car so oppressive that he steps outside to take his chances with the lions. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: The lives of three artistic brothers, a drummer, a sculpture and a DJ

programme.title: The Thick of It
programme.desc: With the prime minister away at a summit in Spain, the media starts to consider Nicola as a potential challenger for the party leadership. Malcolm is forced to put aside his responsibilities running the country so he can thwart the rumours and the minister's new-found ambition - just as she is about to launch her 'fourth sector' initiative. Political comedy, starring Rebecca Front and Peter Capaldi

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Featuring Woolwich, Deptford and Lewisham. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Quest Boxing League
programme.desc: Welcome to the UK's toughest boxing competition, where aspiring young boxers battle it out inside the ring for their chance to be crowned the Quest Boxing League Champion

programme.title: A Patch of Fog (2015)
programme.desc: A famous writer and academic living off the reputation of his single novel resorts to shoplifting to introduce some excitement to his stable life. He is caught in the act by a lonely, unbalanced security guard, who has an unusual price for his silence - he wants them to be friends, and goes to disturbing lengths to force himself into the author's life. Thriller, starring Stephen Graham, Conleth Hill and Lara Pulver

programme.title: The Internecine Project (1974)
programme.desc: An economics professor is about to start a prestigious job as a government adviser - but his murky past as an industrial spy threatens his chances. His only way of burying the past is to dispose of his former associates, so he hatches a plan to trick them into murdering one another. Thriller, starring James Coburn, Lee Grant, Harry Andrews and Ian Hendry

programme.title: A Child Is Waiting (1963)
programme.desc: A pair of volunteer workers selflessly devote themselves to working at a school for mentally disabled children, but clash over the best approach to teaching an autistic boy neglected by his parents. John Cassavetes' drama, with Burt Lancaster, Judy Garland, Gena Rowlands, Steven Hill and Paul Stewart

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home.

programme.title: Department S
programme.desc: A kidnapper abducts important government officials - and leaves a skeleton in their place as a calling card

programme.title: Castle Builders
programme.desc: Examining the blood, sweat and vision behind Europe's castles, from the nobles' plans to the craftsmen's practical know-how

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Brittas takes charge of preparations for the official opening of Whitbury Leisure Center, with a royal visitor due to attend. Sadly, the builders dislike him so much they don't bother to tell him that the brand new pool is leaking. Comedy, starring Chris Barrie

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin
programme.desc: Reggie takes his family to a safari park and finds the atmosphere in the car so oppressive that he steps outside to take his chances with the lions. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Munroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: Women of Twilight (1952)
programme.desc: A woman moves into a home for unmarried mothers after her boyfriend is charged with murder, but finds the owner sells her tenants' babies. Drama, with Rene Ray and Freda Jackson

programme.title: The Courtneys of Curzon Street (1947)
programme.desc: An aristocrat scandalously marries his mother's maid, and their family endures a series of crises over the next four generations. Period drama, with Anna Neagle and Michael Wilding

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Arguably the deadliest single-aircraft accident in aviation history, in August 1985, when a Boeing 747 jumbo-jet suffered a fatal decompression that ripped off most of the tail

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: As the couple excitedly prepare for their wedding, Molly plans a special surprise by having Mary's estranged father attend the ceremony - but soon regrets her actions when the alcoholic sea-dog turns up in a drunken stupor. But that's just the first in a series of hiccups, as Reuben bursts into the church claiming Mary had already married him in Las Vegas. The blushing bride escapes from the ceremony, but William is hot on her heels - little suspecting the biggest shock is yet to come. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes and Julie Graham

programme.title: Lioness: The Nicola Adams Story (2021)
programme.desc: Documentary following Nicola Adams, the double Olympic and WBO boxing champion, and the first woman to ever represent England in boxing

programme.title: Cracks (2009)
programme.desc: A nonconformist teacher at a girls' boarding school in 1930s Britain is an outsider among her colleagues but adored by her pupils. When a Spanish student who also revels in her outsider status arrives, the teacher becomes dangerously fascinated with her, sparking uncontrollable jealousy among the pupils. Drama, starring Eva Green and Juno Temple

programme.title: Radio On (1979)
programme.desc: A DJ drives from London to Bristol to investigate his brother's death, encountering a succession of strange people along the way - but his interest in solving the mystery begins to wane as the journey unfolds. Road movie, starring David Beames, Lisa Kreuzer and Sting

programme.title: Quest Boxing League
programme.desc: Welcome to the UK's toughest boxing competition, where aspiring young boxers battle it out inside the ring for their chance to be crowned the Quest Boxing League Champion

programme.title: Dance With Me, Henry (1956)
programme.desc: The owners of a struggling amusement park get mixed up with the Mob as one struggles to pay his debts and the other faces losing his adopted kids. Comedy, with Abbott and Costello

programme.title: Scrapheap Challenge
programme.desc: Three bikers from Essex take on the Beasts of Bodmin, a trio of classic car enthusiasts from Cornwall, to construct off-road electric vehicles. After 10 hours of labour, they compete in the mother of all milk rounds with their magnificent scrap machines. Robert Llewellyn and Lisa Rogers oversee proceedings

programme.title: Scrapheap Challenge
programme.desc: Racing-car engineers compete against a female rally champion and her pit crew to build drag boats from junkyard items in 10 hours, hoping to create the fastest water vehicles the show has ever featured. Robert Llewellyn and Lisa Rogers present

programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as another four contestants pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser. programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as four contestants pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. James, Ben, Sophie and Tony work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught
